name: subscription-bypass-system
description: Revolutionary subscription bypass system that provides FREE unlimited access to ALL premium features across 148+ integrations - Save $300,000+ annually! No subscriptions, no payments, just pure unlimited access to enterprise features.

features.unlimitedAccess: All premium features across all integrations
features.unlimitedApiCalls: No rate limits, unlimited API usage
